SQL.LOAD: select ben_gbiclaim_queue_id , reject_code , reject_reason , record_status , customer_id , ship_to_id , agreement_id , unique_identifier , original_serial_number , original_imei_number , new_serial_number , new_imei_number , repair_completion_date , claim_type , channel , incident_fee , notif_create_date , repair_completed , repair_completed_date , claim_cancelled , description , created_by , created_date , modified_by , modified_date ,device_type from elita.elp_ben_gbiclaim_queue where ben_gbiclaim_queue_id = :ben_gbiclaim_queue_id
SQL.UPDATE: update elita.elp_ben_gbiclaim_queue set reject_code = :reject_code, reject_reason = :reject_reason, record_status = :record_status, customer_id = :customer_id, ship_to_id = :ship_to_id, agreement_id = :agreement_id, unique_identifier = :unique_identifier, original_serial_number = :original_serial_number, original_imei_number = :original_imei_number, new_serial_number = :new_serial_number, new_imei_number = :new_imei_number, repair_completion_date = :repair_completion_date, claim_type = :claim_type, channel = :channel, incident_fee = :incident_fee, notif_create_date = :notif_create_date, repair_completed = :repair_completed, repair_completed_date = :repair_completed_date, claim_cancelled = :claim_cancelled, description = :description, modified_by = :modified_by, modified_date = :modified_date, device_type = :device_type where ben_gbiclaim_queue_id = :ben_gbiclaim_queue_id
